attributes.title: Trumpie Pooh 🙊
attributes.review:
i woke up one morning and seen a notification on my phone from my friend kayla 😖 she said breanna breanna look there’s a new trump app!!! AND at tHAT MOMMEEENTTT!! i knew i had to download it 

as soon as i did i seen trump in the loading screen he was .. well he was giving me these seductive eyes 😋 i couldn’t help myself i felt poisoned i felt as if i was put under a love spell his perfect hairs resting on top of each other i just - i don’t know i just needed more.. so i entered my phone number 😳 hoping for a call back, but i waited for hours and hours, i just spent my time shopping for his merch😩😩 i even found a dild- anyways it said it was an exact replica of the actual thing, it was like a tiny baby cheeto puff but looked.. looked so so pleasing 🤭 as soon as i put that item in my cart i got an email saying to support trump at his re-election in november 😡 i was so mad that he couldn’t give me a call back so i emailed him to show my anger! he replied back surprisingly saying we should meet up! apparently he’s seen me write about him before!! and i obviously was down!!!! 

-a couple weeks go by-
 thiccy trump rump and i have been talking for a couple weeks now, we’ve really gotten to know each other and he’s exactly the same racist homophobic sexist jerk the media makes him out to be but idkk it just turns me onnn hehe xD i even told him that and i think he was blushing 🤪 i couldn’t tell with his fake tan on facetime!! but anyways we have plans to meet up 😱😎 
he’s pulling in the driveway now actually... i see him walk out of the car fixing his tie and putting it back in place from getting messed up in the car. i started drooling a little, literally i felt as if it was all in slow motion, trump pushing his hair back and giving a slight smile as his body guard gives him a nod , he’s sooo dominant, a man who knows what he wants just makes me - well makes me throb 😩 i open the door and welcome him in with a bright smile on my face * oh god did i brush my teeth* he walks in and tells his bodyguards to wait in the car, of course there were still many surrounding the house but he didn’t care he pushed me against the wall behind us knocking over a plant and vase we both smiled through kisses 😏 he reached under my shirt and pulled off my bra- grasping my behind once it was off , he bent me over on the couch and spanked me who owns you he said “my racist sexist homophobic big rumped trump” i say loudly and he came... that was all.. i gained no pleasure from him i even cancelled my maga merch orders this app gave my hopes up DONT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.title: PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😾😾😾😿😾
attributes.review: yesterday night i was having a wonderful time watching ze movie Portrait of a lady on fire 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩, by ze end of ze film i was in tears 😭 of anger sadness happiness and much more✨✨😿✨😿😿✨✨❗️to get over ze amount of distraught ze movie caused me i decided to download this here application for my telephone to show my support and love to our cult lead- i mean President Donald Jesús Trump (biggest mistake of my life 😹😽😾😼😸😿)! after this demonic application finished downloading i sacrifice one infant child to Trumpalicios and went to sleep 😴😴😔😳😿😾😹. that same night i had ze most horrifying dream that i’ve ever experience 😭😭😿😿🙁😟❗️❗️ in my traumatizing dream i was on ze top of the empire state building tied to ze very tip. there was a God like thunder storm, causing ze empire state building to ssshake with fear ❌⚡️🏙! over ze intense howling wind i heard gun shots being repeatedly fired along side bloodcurdling screams 😰😿😿😿😿😭😭❗️ past all the fog and rain i saw our beloved cult lead- President Donald Jesús Trump shooting rounds of bullets at innocent New Yorkers 😿😿😿😭😭😰😰😟😟🙁🙁😔! at this horrific sight i let out a scream louder then ze Victoria Falls of Zimbabwe❗️😰 Unfortunately as i was screaming a hybrid of human and a centipede with ze face a President Donald Jesús Trumpeted ze siZe of an elephant crawled into my mouth - killing me instantly. ze dismantled remains of my inanimate body flew 🌪🌪💨💨🌬🌬off ze empire state building in front of a crowd of pigs 🐖🐷🐽👮🏻‍♂️👮🏼‍♂️👮🏽‍♂️👮🏾‍♀️👮🏿‍♀️👮🏽‍♀️👮dressed in blue. President centipede Trump rattled down ze huge building, causing an earthquake with his speed. he got to ze bottom of ze building stood on his hind legs in front of my once beautiful body and began to eat my remains along side ze fat pigs in blue. ze New Yorkers disgusted by what had happened began to protest❗️❗️❗️ and then i woke up in a nervous sweat 😓😓😰💧💦. i jumped out of bed and walked over to my beloved pet dog Leia to. say salutations - JUST TO SEE THAT SHE WAS SPRAY PAINTED ORANGE 🍊 AND HAD THE PHRASE “CHILD RAPIST WAS HERE” SCRAWLED ON HER BODY❗️❗️😾😿😿😿😿😓😓😭😭😰😰😟😟😔😔🙁🙁. i took my poor dog to my back yard to bathe her, but as soon as a switched ze tap on frogs and cockroaches along side dirty sewage water began to spew out ❗️❗️😭😟😿 in an act of horror i left my home with my dog Leia but as soon as a stepped a foot out my doorway i saw a tree 🌳 alongside many trees hacked down, cover in poison caterpillars. i ran inside and, up to my bed chamber with my dog and began to pray to God that she would grant me mercy. i began to think why God would do this to me? but then i realized- THE TRUMP 2020 APP ❗️❗️❗️😭😭😭😔😟😓😾 i picked up my telephone which was now cracked in every spot but where ze trump 2020 app  was located. i deleted ze application immediately and I felt as if a burden has been lifted. as soon as i deleted the app an angle came down from ze angelic land of heaven (no men allowed unless he’s a femboy) and told me that if i hadn’t deleted that app just then i would have implode because of Donald Jesús Trump❗️❗️❗️❗️🙏🏽🙏🏽🙏🏽 i wouldn’t wish this fate upon anyone but if you want to avoid this fate NEVER downloaded this cursed application 😟😟😟😭😿😾😰🙁😓 if i could give this app zero stars i would 😳😾😿 I NOW NO LONGER SUPPORT TRUMP
